mapper.sql: v_distribution_task_id , v_project_id, v_village_id, v_principal_id, i_elevator_count, i_status, v_template_file_url, v_address, v_ dt_create_time, dt_modify_time, v_create_user_id, v_modify_user_id, i_del_flag
mapper.select: select tbl.v_distribution_task_id, tbl.v_project_id, tbl.v_village_id, tbl.v_project_id, tbl.v_principal_id, tbl.i_elevator_count, tbl.v_address, tbl.i_status, tbl.i_next_step, tbl.v_init_elevator_code, tbl.v_init_verify_code, tbl.i_shortcut, tbl.i_cube_count, tbl.v_distributer_name, case when tbl.i_status = 1 then '未配货' when tbl.i_status = 2 then '配货中' when tbl.i_status = 3 then '完成' when tbl.i_status = -1 then '已取消' else '' end as i_status_name, tbl.v_template_file_url, tbl.dt_create_time, tbl.dt_modify_time, tbl.v_create_user_id, tbl.v_modify_user_id, tbl.i_del_flag, village.v_village_name, project.v_project_name, u.v_name as v_principal_name, file.dt_modify_time as upload_time, file.v_modify_user_id as upload_user_id, sysinfo.v_name_zh_cn AS i_del_flag_name from tbl_distribution_task tbl left join tbl_sys_user as u on u.v_user_id = tbl.v_principal_id left join tbl_pm_file as file on file.v_target_id = tbl.v_distribution_task_id left join tbl_project project on project.v_project_id = tbl.v_project_id left join tbl_sys_dept dept on dept.v_dept_id = project.v_dept_id left join tbl_village village on village.v_village_id = tbl.v_village_id left join tbl_sys_systeminfo sysinfo on sysinfo.v_sysvalue5 = tbl.i_del_flag and sysinfo.v_sysid = '10012' where tbl.v_distribution_task_id = #{vDistributionTaskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select v_distribution_task_id, v_project_id, v_village_id, from tbl_distribution_task
v_distribution_task_id = #{distributionTaskId}

select project.v_project_name as projectName, village.v_village_name as villageName, IFNULL(tbl.i_elevator_count, 0) as elevatorCount, dept.v_dept_name as deptName, elevator.v_equipment_code as equipmentCode, elevator.v_address as address from tbl_distribution_task as tbl join tbl_project as project on tbl.v_project_id = project.v_project_id join tbl_village as village on tbl.v_village_id = village.v_village_id join tbl_sys_dept as dept on project.v_dept_id = dept.v_dept_id join tbl_elevator as elevator on elevator.v_village_id = tbl.v_village_id where tbl.v_distribution_task_id = #{vDistributionTaskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by tbl.dt_modify_time asc
